result.arabic_text: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
result.translation: (9) Look how they strike for you comparisons;[1009] but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
result.footnotes: [1009]- From their own imaginations in order to deny and discredit you.
